reviews.review:
No kde bych začal. Portal je neskutečná série, kterou budu dohrávat dál a dál. Mám rád ten pocit když dojdu do nové místnosti a můžete začít přemýšlet jak se dostat na druhou čáast místnosti. Rozhodně velké plus celé hry je že to rozjede každý počítač. Soundrack a příběh nemusím vůbec komentovat.

10/10 !!!

Great game, great fun, would recomend to new steam users, i am new to steam so the summer sale is great,

Puzzle+Action= Portal 

A good game that makes you feel proud when you beat a level.

Portal é um jogo que todo mundo deveria jogar, a história e construção dos personagens é incrivel junto com a trilha sonora. Jogo baseado em a solução de puzzles envolvendo portais. Não há muito o que falar apenas que todo mundo deveria jogar, é possivel encontrar o pacote com os 2 portais por menos de 10 reais.

bom... esse jogo e um dos melhores ,com uma História Incrivél,puzzels dificies,e uma historia oculta maravilhosa

Al pasar el juego se abren algunos niveles ya pasados con mayor dificultad y algunos objetivos.

Probably the best game of all time

I mean yeah, at the time it must have been mindblowing and I can admit it has charm. But I did play Portal 2 before this one so naturally, this felt lacking and was way to short. 

I'd say buy both of them, but if you really only want to buy one, buy the second game.

创意十足的游戏。
最初是别人的库里面玩的，花了4个多小时通关，现在夏促打折，就补了一波票，1个小时就再通关了。
这游戏的传送门玩法是一个亮点，同时glados这个设定又是一大亮点。幽默风趣同时AI味道十足的glados让我经常停下来看字幕。
通关以后的歌曲也很好听。
tero weno amigues 100% recomend !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Definitely worth the 1$ price.

ПРОСТО КЛАСССССССССССССССССС!

A classic that I never found the time to play, but have now completed. Eventhough the levels are completely linear the story is interessting and the character design of the only npc creative.
Gameplay is awesome and can not be compared with any other game I have ever tried before, because it reminds partially of oldschool jump'n'run games, but without the exhausting constant pressure, and is on the other hand very immersive. It forces you to think quite unconventionally and makes you pay attention to even the smallest details. 
The character design of the only NPC and the weird atmosphere of the setting make story fun to follow.
Only downside is the rather short time nessecary for completion: It took me just over 4 hours and I defintely took my time!
THE CAKE ISNT A LIE
Bello
One of my all time fave puzzle games. Bought the 2 pack for like $3. It's timeless and I wish they'd make a 3rd fourth and 5th!!!
Best Puzzle game ever
Incredible game!  A little short but a must have for any type of gamer.
Made as a testing for Valve to prepare their next big hit with the second upcoming game, was more of a masterpiece game rather than a testing.

This game has definitely recieved the credit it deserves. It has awesome puzzles that slowly get more difficult while still being fun, a  simple yet interesting story, and a pretty decent amount of humor. Everyone should play this game at least once in their life! :D
Un juego increíble, aunque con una historia corta, muy entretenido y si te hace pensar bastante, completamente recomendable :D
Excellent precurser to arguably the greatest single player puzzle game ever.

mastapeece

I finally understand why everyone speaks so highly of this game. Even almost 11 years later, the graphics don't look tacky and the gameplay is fascinating. This game is good enough that I only have 2 complaints: no Steam cards, and no hints. It would be nice for GLaDOS to have given snarky nudges in the correct direction during early game, but it's understandable that she doesn't (and way too late to add that). Steam cards can always be added, should they choose.

I finally understand the cake jokes from an emotional level, rather than just intellectually.
There will be cake.

Mecánicas increibles y mapas repletos de buena ambientación

jak na gre za 3 zł to takie 8/10
The game is well paced and funny.

El juego es muy bueno, si estas aburrido de los juegos de siempre y buscas unas buenas mecanicas de juego, si o si te tienes que comprar Portal. NO es caro y NO NECESITA UNA COMPUTADORA DE LA NASA para poder jugarlo con sus mejores graficos y fluido. 10/10 <<RECOMENDADO>>

La verdad Portal es un juego bastante corto, sin embargo, si te gustan los asertijos, este juego te va a encantar, la campaña es corta, pero las historia es interesante. También cuenta con desafios como completar cierto nivel en cierto tirmpo o dando cierto limite de pasos. Me gusto mucho el diseño del juego, realmente te hace sentir parte de él y sientes esa soledead que el personaje tiene. Es un juego divertido que sin duda no me arrepiento de haber comprado por su bajo precio y que vale muchísimo la pena.

Spinto dalla voglia di provare alcuni tra più noti puzzle games ho scaricato i due Portal. Ho giocato al primo capitolo senza tenere in considerazione dell'esistenza del secondo (che proverò ovviamente in futuro) al fine di valutarlo per quel che è: un rompicapo dagli enigmi relativamente semplici ma geniali piuttosto breve. 
Ed è qui che arriva il suo pregio principale: nella sua brevità riesce a garantire un'esperienza di gioco perfetta dall'inizio alla fine (tralasciando qualche crush avvenuto e i caricamenti mai lunghi che però spezzano il gioco sebbene essi siano in fasi non rilevanti) mescolando abilmente tra loro generi diversi come rompicapo, platform ed FPS.
Non mi dilungherò ad anallizzare la storia (e le ipotesi che mi sono sorte), le musiche, i dialoghi e ogni altro aspetto del gioco, ma mi limiterò a consigliarlo a tutti, che voi siate amanti o non di generi come il rompicapo.
Voto: 9/10

A game that is as nice as it is short. Only 3 hours to play through, but for under 1€ (which I payed in Summer Sale) it is defenitly a nice puzzle game, with good level design and numerous jokes. All in all an outstanding game!

Obra maestra, ni más ni menos. Es un juego símplemente perfecto al cual nunca le había echado el guante hasta ahora por su escasa duración. Ahora me doy cuenta de que la duración es perfecta. Además recomiendo jugarlo una segunda vez ya que te das cuenta de muchos detalles de la historia que en la primera vuelta no te diste cuenta. 10/10

Одна из самых лучших игр от Valve! Я просто погрузился в мир Portal! Я никогда не чувствовал от игры такой каеф) Хоть и игра довольно старая (очень старая), графон очень классный! ни одного лага или какого-либо бага. Почти все достижения я выполнил. Сам сюжет реально отличный и интересный. Не понимаю почему я раньше его не покупал на первый аккаунт. Я рекомендую эту игру и не слушайте никого, сразу покупайте)))
Лучше поупать на летних распродажах Steam, т.к. Portal стоит (на данный момент) 25 р
P.S. Я покупал пак игр)

este maldito juego no tiene ni para el mando xD pero me hizo sentir muy comodo jugarlo... porque? no lo se... cerveza? 3 por favor... meh! su jugabilidad es comoda, relajante y sin apuros, solo te paras... miras y resulves el puzzle, es antiguo el juego y es una lastima que dure tan poco, pero es altamente recomendable: "Los clasicos de valve" los infaltables, los que siempre entretienen... parecido a los simpsons en mi infacia

Portal is the single best puzzle game I have ever played. It is a unique way to approach puzzles by putting you into the enviroment rather than observing the environment like other puzzle games. Each puzzles have multiple solutions and a fun story tied to the whole thing. You should deffinitely play this all the way through at least once in life.
